spacecraft.name: Mon Calamari cruiser
spacecraft.description: Class Cruiser Armaments Turbolasers Ion cannons Tractor beam projectors Defenses Deflector shields Length 1,200-17,000 Meters (depending on the ship)

spacecraft.name: Death star
spacecraft.description: Class Initially Imperator, later Imperial Fighters 6 TIE squadrons (72 Ships) Auxiliary craft 2 Lambda-class shuttles Armaments Turbolasers Ion cannons Tractor beam projectors Defenses Shield generators Propulsion Solar ionization reactor Length 1,600 meters (5,200 ft) Width 1,015 meters (3,330 ft)
